channel.title: Projects on Julio Gomez | Gameplay & Network Engineer

item.title: I Want My Toys
item.description: A commercially successful P2P multiplayer game focusing on networking and gameplay engineering.

item.title: Tools & Engine Utilities

item.title: Zero Gravity 6-DOF
item.description: A physics-based 6-DOF controller showcasing advanced vector math and projection techniques.
